{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2965216,"name":"jweiland1","username":"jweiland1","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jweiland1/{size}/159086_2.png","created_at":"2021-08-13T22:42:42.365Z","cooked":"

The Virtual Robot Simulator Downloadable VRS Platform! – Virtual Robot Simulator is looking to expand our team. The VRS simulator has the capability to teach block programming an onbot java and has a multiplayer (e-sport) component. We are looking for FRC/FTC students or alumni who have a strong portfolio in some or all: app development, web design, java script, java, typescript, using blockly, iframe, block or java programming. Interested in joining the team? or want to learn more?. apply here

This is a great opportunity! Don’t hesitate to apply we are looking for all types of help in website development as well as our simulation with Unity. It’s been lots of fun and such a valuable experience for me.

If you have any question feel free to ask. Hope to see some new people soon!
